room_title: Escape room "The Oregon Files" by Stumptown Escape Games in Portland
review: We did The Oregon Files and got stumped by Stumptown Escape Games - we were so close to getting out - just needed a few more seconds. It was challenging but a lot of fun! Great group activity.

room_title: Escape room "The Oregon Files" by Stumptown Escape Games in Portland
review: Went to Stumptown for a birthday party. Most of us had never done an escape room before. We did the Oregon Files room and came *thisclose* to finishing it. Our Gamemaster Miah was great! So helpful and very funny. We're definitely interested in coming back and trying the other rooms. Thanks for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Oregon Files" by Stumptown Escape Games in Portland
review: We had a blast did the Oregon files room cant wait tell we go again! The staff was amazing made it so much fun. See you soon
